mapper.insert: insert into member(userID, passwd, name, email, post, addr1, addr2, phone ) values (#{userID},#{passwd},#{name},#{email},#{post},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{phone})
mapper.update: update member set mail_key=#{mail_key} where email=#{email} and userID=#{userID}
update member set mail_auth=1 where email=#{email} and mail_key=#{mail_key}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where userID=#{userID} and mail_auth=1
